sn35.82:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.82:2.2: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccati”ti?
sn35.82:2.6: Rupa lujjanti, cakkhuvinnanam lujjati, cakkhusamphasso lujjati, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi lujjati …pe…
sn35.82:2.8: mano lujjati, dhamma lujjanti, manovinnanam lujjati, manosamphasso lujjati, yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi lujjati.
sn35.82:2.9: Lujjatiti kho, bhikkhu, tasma lokoti vuccati”ti.
